content:
CompSci 260P Projects

  • Projects are to be done by teams of size two, chosen by mutual consent (students have the option to form a "team" of size 1)
    • IMPORTANT: "Done by teams" means that team members must each contribute substantially to the project submission
    • The team members must register their team (by the roster due date listed on the Class Schedule)
      by making use of the 260P Project Google Form
    • Access is restricted: user name is your UCInetID (in ALL CAPITAL LETTERS) and password is your 8-character student number

  • Projects are to be submitted to the class dropbox before 11:00am on the submission deadline date listed on the Class Schedule.
    • No late submissions will be accepted
    • Instructions for using EEE dropbox can be found at https://eee.uci.edu/help/dropbox/students/
    • One team member should submit a zip file containing all required deliverables
      IMPORTANT: Submit only one zip file that contains all files you wish to be considered. Do not submit any other files.
    • Code must be original, and may not be copied or shared from any other source, except as provided by the class instructor

Last modified: Sep 22, 2019
